Items.Title: Application No. C 170240 ZMK submitted by SP North of North Limited Partnership, pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter, for an amendment of the zoning map, section no. 28d, changing a portion of the block bounded by Neptune Avenue, West 28th Street, Mermaid Avenue, and West 29th Street, from R5 and R5/C1-2 zoning districts to R5, R6, R6A and R7A/C2-4 zoning districts, Borough of Brooklyn, Community Board 13, Council District 47.
